mean_cn: n. 资产阶级，中产阶级
mean_en: the middle class of society :the social class of skilled workers, business and professional people, and government officials
word_etyma: bourgeois资产阶级的 + ie小称 → bourgeoisie 资产阶级
sentence: Jean and Henri were both merchants and respectable members of the French bourgeoisie.
sentence_trans: 尚和亨利都是商人和体面的法国中产阶级分子。
